title: Substitution and income effect for normal good

content.question: Which of the following is true of the substitution effect of an increase in the price of a normal good?

choices.label: It works to offset the income effect.
It works to reinforce the income effect.
It is less than the income effect.
It causes an increase in the quantity demanded of the good.
It causes an increase in the demand for the good.

content.answer: It works to reinforce the income effect.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
